aqi.veryGood: The air quality is very good, go for a run.
aqi.good: The air quality is good, go for a run.
aqi.sensitive: The air quality is moderate. If you are very sensitive to air pollution choose a shorter or easy run.
aqi.poor: The air quality is poor. If you are sensitive to air pollution choose a shorter or easy run.
aqi.veryPoor: The air quality is very poor. If you are in a sensitive group, choose walk instead. Everyone else should choose a shorter or easy run.
aqi.hazardous: The air quality is very poor. If you are in a sensitive group, avoid all outdoor physical activities. Everyone else should consider rescheduling outdoor activity.
aqi.noInfo: We could not provide air quality tips at the moment.

weather.moderate: temperature is moderate, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.hot: It's quite hot outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.veryHot: It's very hot outside, avoid overheating, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.cold: It's cold outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.coldAndWindy: It's cold and windy outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.freezingCold: It's freezing cold outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.windy: It's windy outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.
weather.rainy: It's raining outside, see clothing tips to know what to wear.

head.moderate: Wear light buff or headband if you like.
head.hot: Wear something light to protect from the sun.
head.cold: Wear light running beanie headband or buff.
head.freezingCold: Wear extra warm beanie or buff.

body.moderate: Wear tee or long sleeve if you need.
body.hot: Breathable material light tee is enough, wear light colors to protect from the sun.
body.coldAndWindy: Warm long sleeve and windproof jacket will be perfect.
body.freezingCold: Wear baselayer, midlayer or softshell jacket.
body.rainy: Put on waterproof jacket on top!
body.windy: Put on windproof jacket on top if you need.

legs.hot: Light shorts or short tights should be enough.
legs.moderate: Light shorts or short tights should be enough.
legs.coldAndWindy: Wear long tights, consider choosing windproof one if you get cold easily.
legs.freezingCold: Wear warm winter tights, consider adding extra layer if you get cold easily.
legs.rainy: Wear long tights, if you don't like getting wet consider wearing tights/pants with waterproof membrane.

shoes.cold: Wear running shoes with good grip. If your feets get cold easily consider shoes with membrane.
shoes.rainy: If you don't like getting wet consider wearing shoes with waterproof membrane.
